comments: Investigate the possibility of deadlock in BackgroundSaveTimer. Came in one morning to find my workbench locked up and the progress view full of "Saving Task Data (waiting)" entries.  Although this may have been the result of technical problems elsewhere, it warrants investigation.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasks.ui.util.TaskDataExportJob.run(TaskDataExportJob.java:101)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.tasks.ui.TaskListBackupManager$ExportJob.run(TaskListBackupManager.java:195)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Looks like TasksUiPlugin.getDefault() is null.
Should only be null during startup or shutdown.  Perhaps just add a null check or a check for Platform.isRunning()?
Done. Will watch for this and close if resolved.
